alert.note: Alert for Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:01PM EDT until June 09 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 301 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Beaufort Marine Corps Air Station to Old House, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Beaufort, Port Royal, Clarendon, Jasper, Lemon Island, Shell Point, Burton, Calawassie Island, Old House, Laurel Bay, Dale, Beaufort Marine Corps Air Station and Parris Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
